page.title: 03West Farnham News
page.content: Two{newspapers}are published in this area:The Farnham Herald and The Surrey and Hants News. Reported this year:- {Incidents}: On Sunday 2nd June two twin boys were saved after a serious crash,on the controversial junction at Hickleys corner.The car rolled over but fortunately the twins were wearing seatbelts. {Events}: The Farnham Carnival took place on Saturday 1st July. It began and finished at the Hart car park after working it's way through the Borough and round the one_way system. {News}: It was on Tuesday the 18th June 150 years ago that William Cobbett died....Mrs Virginia Bottomley, MP for Farnham, is to attend a garden party at Buckingham Palace....On Monday 5th August, Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher paid a surprise visit to Farnham to view local small businesses
